title: Herbal Mist - Sylvan Meditation
cleaned_text: This lovely blend brings the essence of a beautiful evergreen forest into your space no matter where you are. This natural mist smells fresh and green. INGREDIENTS: filtered rainwater, witch hazel, and pure essential oils of of pine, cedar, fir and spruce. DIRECTIONS: Shake well and spray as desired. Avoid contact with skin and eyes. Keep out of reach of children.
